scripts.dev: pm2 start client.js --watch && pm2 start api.js --watch
scripts.monit: npx pm2 start index.js -f && npx pm2 monit
scripts.log: npx pm2 start index.js -f && npx pm2 logs --out
scripts.boot: clear;echo FETCH DATA;git pull origin main; npm install; npx pm2 kill;  echo STARTE WEBSERVER; npx pm2 start web/web.js -f; echo STARTE BOT CLIENT; npx pm2 start index.js -f; echo ALL SCRIPTS ARE RUNNING;  npx pm2 save --force; npx pm2 list;
